title: "Personal familiarity of music and its cerebral effect on subsequent speech processing"
excerpt: "Despite the obvious personal relevance of some musical pieces, the cerebral mechanisms associated with listening to personally familiar music and its effects on subsequent brain functioning have not been specifically evaluated yet."
